\documentclass{beamer}
\usetheme{Boadilla}

\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{qrcode}

\usepackage{tikz}

\usetikzlibrary{shapes.arrows,shapes.callouts,patterns,decorations.pathmorphing,
  decorations.markings,shapes,arrows.meta,positioning}
\tikzset{
  invisible/.style={opacity=0},
  visible on/.style={alt={#1{}{invisible}}},
  alt/.code args={<#1>#2#3}{%
    \alt<#1>{\pgfkeysalso{#2}}{\pgfkeysalso{#3}} % \pgfkeysalso doesn't change the path
  },
}

\title{Emacs cart.el test presentation}
\author{Nidish Narayanaa Balaji}

  \frametitle{Test Frame 3}

      \end{block}};
